Package com.google.appinventor.components.scripts

Class Summary
ComponentDescriptorGenerator Tool to generate simple component descriptors as JSON.
ComponentListGenerator Tool to generate a list of the simple component types, and the permissions required for each component.
ComponentProcessor Processor for generating output files based on the annotations and javadoc in the component source code.
ComponentProcessor.Feature Represents a component feature that has a name and a description.
ComponentProcessor.Property Represents a Young Android component property (annotated with SimpleProperty).
DocumentationGenerator Generates user-level HTML documentation for Young Android components into a single html file.
LangDefXmlGenerator Processes component source files to generate an XML file to specify a language to Codeblocks.
